title: Hair Restoration Firm Veradermics Jumps 122% In Trading Debut
description: Shares of hair-restoration drug developer Veradermics Inc. soared 122% in the company’s trading debut after it raised $256.3 million in an initial public offering.
content: Shares of hair-restoration drug developer Veradermics Inc. soared 122% in the company’s trading debut after it raised $256.3 million in an initial public offering.
